author: Special Correspondent
text: Chief Minister Jayalalithaa on Monday announced a solatium of Rs. one lakh to each of the kin of the three girl students of a private yoga college in Villupuram district. Ms. Jayalalithaa, in a statement, condoled their death and ordered the solatium from the Chief Minister’s Public Relief Fund. “I have directed the police to thoroughly investigate the deaths and take appropriate action,” she said.
title: Solatium announced
